meanings.sent1: The barny between the siblings could be heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors could hear the barny coming from the apartment next door.
meanings.sent3: The barny over who gets the last cookie was settled with a game of rock-paper-scissors.
meanings.sent4: The barny in the courtroom was so loud, it felt like thunder echoing in the halls.
meanings.sent5: The barny at the town meeting left everyone feeling tense and uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: To have a noisy argument or disagreement.
meanings.sent1: They barnyed about which movie to watch on movie night.
meanings.sent2: The kids barnyed over who gets to sit in the front seat of the car.
meanings.sent3: The couple barnyed playfully over who makes the best pancakes.
meanings.sent4: The politicians barnyed for hours on the floor of the parliament.
meanings.sent5: The team barnyed about the best strategy to win the game.
